meanings.definition: A small antelope found in Africa.
meanings.sent1: Dikdiks are tiny antelopes in Africa.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of dikdiks while on safari.
meanings.sent3: The dikdiks played hide and seek in the grass.
meanings.sent4: The dikdiks moved gracefully like dancers in the savanna.
meanings.sent5: The dikdiks' delicate features make them unique among animals.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'dikdik'.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the dikdiks running around!
meanings.sent2: The dikdiks grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The dikdiks gathered for a dikdik convention.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with dikdiks, a sea of tiny antelopes.
meanings.sent5: The dikdiks' presence added charm to the African landscape.
